column2: Maybe the only threat to a halfling that might make them fight harder is a threat to their food.
Who doesn't fight also doesn't eat!
Nothing like a snack mid-battle to re-invigourate a halfling!
If we can't save the food, then why are we even fighting?
Not as dangerous as the breath of an adult, but it is still advised to avoid being its target.
Strange food make strong, eat lots get impressive gut! Taste like dead plague rat though! - Unknown Ogre Mercenary
